name: Kevros
description: AI governance gateway with cryptographic enforcement. Five x402-paid endpoints: action verification ($0.01), provenance attestation ($0.02), intent-command binding ($0.02), outcome verification (free), and compliance evidence bundles ($0.25). Every decision issues a signed release token. Every action is hash-chained. ML-DSA-87 post-quantum signatures for long-term non-repudiation. USDC on Base.
